definition: to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink

sentences.english: Objective To improve the TLC identification of Unguentum tetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 目的对四环素软膏薄层色谱鉴别法进行改进。

sentences.english: I had to use an acetate fluocinolone ointment, one just fine .
sentences.chinese: 我只好用了一次醋酸氟轻松软膏，一次就好了。

sentences.english: The ointment of montmorillonite oxide fit the nation standard and is safety to human.
sentences.chinese: 纳米蒙脱土软膏是一种符合国家安全标准的新产品。

sentences.english: The method of microbial limit test for Guoyu Shangtongning Ointment was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立国玉伤痛宁软膏的微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Develop a method for determination of tetrahydropalmatine in Tongjing cream.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定痛经软膏中延胡索乙素的含量。

sentences.english: For example, Dang Gui is found in balms to help with burns and such.
sentences.chinese: 例如，烧伤等所用的镇痛软膏中就含有当归。

sentences.english: Mercury was used in the form of ointments, oral administration, and vapor baths.
sentences.chinese: 水银以软膏，口头的管理，并且蒸汽洗澡形式被使用。

sentences.english: Apply a small amount of cream or ointment and rub it in gently.
We have here a kind of maternal and child health care hospital Tannin ointment works well.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里的妇幼保健院有一种鞣酸软膏效果很好。

sentences.english: He received ointment for his flaking skin.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他开了治疗脱皮的软膏。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the anti-inflammatory and analgesic action of Yantongxiao unguent.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察炎痛消软膏的抗炎镇痛作用。

sentences.english: Ancient Egyptians made ointments of honey to treat various injuries.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及人也把蜂蜜软膏用来治疗各种伤病。

sentences.english: He rubbed his aching legs with liniment.
sentences.chinese: 他用软膏揉擦发痛的双腿。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preparation method of Shizhen ointment, and establish the standard and method of it's quality control.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究湿疹软膏的制备及质量控制标准与方法。

sentences.english: Sterile bandages should be applied, along with an antibiotic cream or ointment.
sentences.chinese: 应该使用无菌绑带，以及抗菌清洗液或者软膏。

sentences.english: This ointment will calm the pain.

definition: voltaren, a trade name for diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller
